For this reason, you should

Flying and travel
Flying is not harmful for you or 
your baby, but some airlines will 
not	let	you	fly	towards	the	end	
of your pregnancy, and you 
should check conditions with 
them.
Long distance travel (longer 
than	five	hours)	carries	a	small	
risk of thrombosis (blood 
clots) in pregnant women. If 
you	fly,
